sentences.en: He was tall for an eight-year-old.
sentences.cn: 对一个8岁的孩子来说他长得很高。

sentences.en: One weekend, Taylor, an eight-year-old girl, went shopping with her parents.
sentences.cn: 一个周末，八岁的女孩泰勒和她的父母去购物。

sentences.en: Seventy-eight-year-old Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg's job security is guaranteed in the Constitution.
sentences.cn: 78岁高龄的最高法院大法官露丝·巴德·金斯伯格的工作保障受到宪法的保护。
